sentences.english: They topped off the hut with a straw thatch.
sentences.chinese: 他们给小屋盖上茅草屋顶。

sentences.english: Thee swallow twittering from the straw-built shed.
sentences.chinese: 茅草棚上燕子的细语呢喃。

sentences.english: There was a large building in front of me with an old fashioned thatched roof.
sentences.chinese: 我前面是一座大房子，它的老式屋顶是用茅草盖的。

sentences.english: Maocaojie locates in the south of Nanxian county of Yiyang city.
sentences.chinese: 茅草街在益阳南县的最南面。

sentences.english: He is a green young man.
sentences.chinese: 他是个初出茅草屋的年轻人。
修理茅草屋屋顶的三个男人。

sentences.english: The thatched cottage was submerged by drift sand.
sentences.chinese: 这个茅草屋被流沙淹没了。

sentences.english: The craft of thatching as it is practised today has changed very little since the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 自中世纪以来，今天操作的茅草屋顶手艺变化得很少。

sentences.english: The local people live in thatched cottages .
The natives of that region still live in primitive straw huts.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区的居民依然住在简陋的茅草屋里。

sentences.english: Liu Hong had installed himself in one of the farmers' huts.
sentences.chinese: 刘洪自己住在一个农户的茅草屋里面。

sentences.english: Weeping Alkaligrass with high nutrient value can decrease the salt content of salinized soil surface.
sentences.chinese: 碱茅草能降低盐渍化土壤表层的含盐量，营养价值高。

sentences.english: Experience the plush comfort and enjoy exotic splendor of these thatched cottages .
sentences.chinese: 体验豪华舒适和享受异国情调的辉煌，这些茅草屋。

sentences.english: With all these reasons to start thatching roofs again.
sentences.chinese: 因为这些，所以重新开始茅草屋顶。

sentences.english: The people of the village live in neat huts with grass roofs.
sentences.chinese: 村民们住在整洁的茅草屋中。
